title: ID less responsive to i rates, less crowding out

content.question: If investment demand becomes less responsive to changes in interest rates, which of the following is true?

choices.label: An expansionary fiscal policy results in less crowding out.
An expansionary fiscal policy results in more crowding out.
An expansionary monetary policy is more effective.
A contractionary monetary policy is more effective.
An expansionary monetary policy results in more crowding out.

content.answer: An expansionary fiscal policy results in less crowding out.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
